channel.title: Spectator mod crash
channel.description:
Hey.
I've just installed SML and the Spectator mod for SML. When I attempt to load into my world, this is what I get in the console:
[SML] Initializing Paks! [SML] test [SML] test [SML] test LogStreaming: Error: Couldn't find file for package /Game/FactoryGame/SpectatorMod-1 requested by async loading code. NameToLoad: /Game/FactoryGame/SpectatorMod-1 LogStreaming: Error: Found 0 dependent packages... LogWindows: Warning: CreateProc failed: The system cannot find the file specified. (0x00000002)
What am I doing wrong?

item.title: Spectator mod crash
item.dc:creator: @Marton_Meszaros Marton Meszaros
item.description:
@Marton_Meszaros wrote:

Hey.

I’ve just installed SML and the Spectator mod for SML.
When I attempt to load into my world, this is what I get in the console:

[SML] Initializing Paks!
[SML] test
[SML] test
[SML] test
LogStreaming: Error: Couldn’t find file for package /Game/FactoryGame/SpectatorMod-1 requested by async loading code. NameToLoad: /Game/FactoryGame/SpectatorMod-1
LogStreaming: Error: Found 0 dependent packages…
LogWindows: Warning: CreateProc failed: The system cannot find the file specified. (0x00000002)

What am I doing wrong?

Read full topic
